aboutme.title: About {me}
aboutme.about1: I'm a full-stack 17 years old developer from France. I started coding when I was 13 with Java through Codecademy, then learned JavaScript, by making a Discord Bot ({huskybotLink}) and by using Codecademy again.
aboutme.about2: Then I started making websites with Express and EJS, and now I'm using Nuxt and Express.
aboutme.about3: I'm passionate about web development and I love to create beautiful and efficient websites.

projects.title: My {projects}
projects.portfolioDescription: My personal portfolio, made with Nuxt.js.
projects.musicDescription: My website for my music career, rewrote with Nuxt.js.
projects.homeclockDescription: A focus-driven, minimalist, and simple clock app, for people with attention deficit.
projects.dockerwatchDescription: A docker container and cli tool to watch for docker events and execute a command when an event occurs.
projects.vanillyDescription: The website for the streamer VanillyNeko, made with Nuxt.js.
projects.nathanDescription: A website for a friend of mine, to showcase his photographic work.
